short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extrae datos de pedidos de Shopify y muéstralos en el panel lateral

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Shopify Order Data Extractor" extension, developed by JonyTips.com, is here to make managing your Shopify orders a breeze. It lets you easily extract and copy key order details, saving you time and effort. This tool is perfect for entrepreneurs and businesses that need to transfer order data to other platforms, like Blue.cl or any courier and logistics systems.

Why you'll love it:
Extract key data in seconds: Get everything you need—name, last name, email, phone, address, city, product description, order total, and more.
User-friendly interface: All the data is presented in a clean, easy-to-read format.
One-click copy: Each piece of data comes with a handy button to copy it instantly and paste it wherever you need.
Works with multiple platforms: Seamlessly transfer data to courier systems like Blue.cl and others.
Modern, functional design: A sleek, optimized interface for a smooth user experience.
What’s in it for you?
Save time: No more manually copying and pasting order details—this tool does the heavy lifting for you.
Reduce errors: Minimize mistakes when transferring data between platforms.
Versatile: Whether you're running a small business or managing a large operation, this tool adapts to your needs.
How does it work?
Open the extension while viewing an order in Shopify.
The extension automatically pulls all the relevant order details.
Copy the data you need with a single click and paste it into your preferred platform.
With the "Shopify Order Data Extractor," managing your orders has never been easier. Try it out and see how much time and hassle you can save!
